info.orestes.rest

Interface Request

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, ReadableContext, javax.servlet.ServletRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RestRequest

    public interface Request
extends ReadableContext, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getArgument(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the matched and converted RestMethod argument if the ConversionHandler had previously processed the Request otherwise the string value
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> getArguments()
      Returns the matched RestMethod arguments which are declared in the route
      <E> E getEntity()
      Returns the converted request entity if the ConversionHandler had processed the Request already otherwise null
      RestMethod getRestMethod()
      Retruns the associated rest method which was selected by the RestRouter
      RestRouter.Route getRoute()
      Returns the route RestRouter.Route which was selected by the RestRouter to route the request
      void setArgument(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
      Set the matched RestMethod argument to the given value.
      void setEntity(java.lang.Object entity)
      Sets the request entity
